metadata.title: CVE-2021-37985 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 95.0.4638.54 allowed aremote attacker who had convinced a user to allow for connection todebugger to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
